Name: Pianistic
About the game: Pianistic is rhythm game that little different from the traditional. Some rhythm games are operated with the keyboard, some with the mouse, but pianistic with both. This means the difficulty may be higher than in existing systems. But don't forget, it's not easy to be a pianist. Meet Pianistic's performance system with masterpieces of piano. Pianistic Rhythm Game Pianistic is rhythm game that is more pianistic than traditional. Gameplay needs two hands playing â”€ Keyboard and Mouse at the same time. Become a pianist with pianistic's performance system. FEATURES Over 20 songs that masterpieces of piano including Rachmaninoff, Chopin, Beethoven, Duke Ellington and others. More songs will be updated. Only support keyboard and mouse input. Control There are two types of notes in pianistic. Square is keyboard note, and circle is mouse note. To explain the keyboard note first, the numbers in 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 correspond to Shift, A, S, D, and Space. Of course, you can change the key in config menu. And the mouse note is operated by vertical movement and click. You can change keyboard note display type to keycodes instead numbers. Standard Song List Der Flohwalzer - Unknown Gymnopedies No.1 - Erik Satie Over The Rainbow - Harold Arlen Moon River - H. Mancini Someone To Watch Over Me - Gershwine Moonlight Sonata Mvt.1 - Beethoven Elegie - Rachmaninoff The Girl from Ipanema - Jobim Fur Elise - Beethoven June Barcarolle - Tchaikovsky Prelude in C Sharp Minor - Rachmaninoff Clair de Lune - Debussy Take The A Train - Duke Ellington Liebestraum No.3 - Franz Liszt Giant Steps - John Coltrane Fantasie Impromptu - Chopin Flight of the Bumblebee - Rimsky Korsakov C Jam Blues - Duke Ellington Ballade No.1 in G minor - Chopin Piano Concerto No.2 Mvt.1 - Rachmaninoff
